LanguageData.ISENeedBaseName: Base name has been set or Map not owned by Player
LanguageData.ISENeedUplink: You must construct the uplink before using the console.
LanguageData.ISEOrderArrived: Your InterStellar Express order has arrived!
LanguageData.ISEOrderFailed: Looks like some items failed to materialise, Please file a report.
LanguageData.ISEProcessingError: There was an error transmitting your order, please try again later.
LanguageData.ISENoOrderMetadata: We couldn't find the shipping manifest for your order. Please file a bug report
LanguageData.ISECantRefund: We had an issue refunding your goods, Please file a bug report
LanguageData.ISECantSubscribe: There was an error when subscribing, Your Silver was refunded.
LanguageData.ISECantGetMarketData: There was an error downloading the market data, Please try again later
LanguageData.ISEThanksForOrder: Thanks for trading with InterStellar Express! We'll keep you updated on your order.
LanguageData.ISEGiveItAway: We can't pay you for goods worth less than 1 Silver, Continue anyway?
LanguageData.ISEBanned: You are banned from using InterStellar Express OR Steam is in offline mode!
LanguageData.ISEBadResponse: The server did not respond or gave an invalid response, It might be down or you might be out of date.\n\nPlease check the Discord, the Ludeon forum or the Steam Workshop for updates and news.
LanguageData.ISEActivateOK: The server accepted the token.\n\nPlease don't use Developer mode or you could end up banned again!
LanguageData.ISEActivateFail: The server did not accepted the token, Please check your token was correct.
LanguageData.ISEServerMaintenanceMode: The server is in maintenance mode, Please try again later.
LanguageData.ISEOutOfDate: This mod version is out of date. You'll need to update before trading.
LanguageData.ISEActivateIncorrect: The token should be 8 characters long.
LanguageData.ISEMaterialiserCosmicEvent: Can't use, Cosmic Event in progress
